meanings.definition: The preliminary matches in a boxing or wrestling event.
meanings.sent1: The undercard featured exciting fights before the main event.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy watching the undercard to see up-and-coming fighters.
meanings.sent3: The undercard bouts were like appetizers before the main course.
meanings.sent4: The undercard set the stage for the championship fight.
meanings.sent5: The undercard bouts were a great warm-up for the audience.

meanings.definition: A secondary or supporting role or position.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the undercard actors played important supporting roles.
meanings.sent2: The undercard players provided crucial assistance to the team.
meanings.sent3: The undercard characters added depth to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: She was happy to take on the undercard role to help her friend shine.
meanings.sent5: The undercard position may not be in the spotlight, but it is essential.
